website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality puzzle and a beautiful artistic rendition of three beloved Harry Potter characters.
pros: Beloved imagery from a pop classic
Durable pieces are made of thick material
Challenging but not overwhelming for older children and adults
cons: It may be best for very young Harry Potter fans to have a bit of adult help

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of puzzles and both were missing pieces. One was missing one piece and one was missing two corner pieces, which was a bummer because that one had been a gift.
customer_reviews.author: ryniel

customer_reviews.title: Seriously,count the pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Pieces were missing. If they were all there I would give it all stars. It just sucks when you get to the end and then you find there are about 5 pieces missing. :(
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Janes

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this puzzle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this puzzle. I love Mary Grandpre's harry potter artwork so I jumped at this. It was a challenging puzzle that took me a long time to build, but the process was very enjoyable. The puzzle pieces feel very high quality and fit together perfectly. I was able to frame this and it stands out as a great art piece for my place!
customer_reviews.author: frabjousdayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: The picture itself is beautiful, but it stinks that you get almost completely done only to find out that it's missing a piece. I should have looked at other reviews on this and other puzzles from New York Puzzle Company first because a lot of other reviews state their puzzles were missing pieces too.
customer_reviews.author: bdbbreak

customer_reviews.title: Fun and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Harry Potter scene puzzle. It is well made and each piece is sturdy and fits together perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Riles

customer_reviews.title: Loved making it
customer_reviews.text: Not a very hard one to make, no missing pieces, and overall I enjoyed making it and love the final result.
customer_reviews.author: Pegah

customer_reviews.title: Really fun! Beautiful artwork
customer_reviews.text: Really fun! Beautiful artwork. Thick, high quality pieces. This is my second NYPC puzzle and I will definitely purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: He enjoyed helping the family with this puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson is "into" Harry Potter now. He enjoyed helping the family with this puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: LR Shopper

customer_reviews.title: We took a chance on this gift. It was a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! Great conversations over this fun puzzle! Nice quality production. We will purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cheek

customer_reviews.title: All pieces were there, good challenge!
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces were there! We had three people working on this for Xmas eve. It took Is about two full days and night to complete it. Generally two people working on it at a time. Really fun and it’s a good challenge. Ordered another one for NYE
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kafka Hovsepian

customer_reviews.title: Misses puzzle pieces
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to doing this puzzle and 2 pieces are missing which is so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Imperia

customer_reviews.title: One. The puzzle set was different from what it ...
customer_reviews.text: One. The puzzle set was different from what it should be. TWO. Missing one piece right in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: HNam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love these puzzles. Perfect for families to do together.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Broken, bent pieces
customer_reviews.text: Tons of broken and bent pieces in the box, I’m super frustrated as I ordered this months ago to have for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Fun Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: We loved putting this puzzle together. Pieces fit together well, some unusually shaped pieces add another little challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Williams Simpson

product_meta.title: New York Puzzle Company - Harry Potter Three Broomsticks - 500 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
product_meta.description:
Hogsmeade village is the perfect getaway for young wizards and witches to escape the rigors of the classroom. Enjoy a butterbeer served by none other than Madame Rosemerta at the Three Broomsticks along with Harry Potter, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in this 500 piece puzzle illustrated by original book cover artist, Mary Grand-Pré.

Three Broomsticks - Harry Potter Illustration by Artist Marie Grand-Pré
500 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
Finished Puzzle Size: 24''x18''
Made in the USA
Recommended Age: 7+ Years
feature_bullets: Three Broomsticks - Harry Potter Illustration by Artist Marie Grand-Pré

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars87 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
